node.statement: SETUP - Assume for contradiction that B is a non-trivial H-invariant block system with block size d (1 < d < N). WLOG assume n >= 1 (tail elements exist in supp(g_1)). Let B be the specific block containing a_1. By definition of block system, for any h in H, either h(B) = B or h(B) is disjoint from B.
